== Early ==
* [[Celegorm]] inflames [[Sons of Fëanor|his brethren]], and they prepare an assault on [[Doriath]], coming up at unawares in winter.<ref name="Years">{{WJ|Years}}, p. 351</ref><ref name="Doriath">{{S|Doriath}}</ref>

==[[Yule]]==
* The [[Second Kinslaying]] occurs, when the Sons of Fëanor attack [[Doriath]] on its east marches, seeking for the [[Silmaril]].<ref name="Years"/><ref name="Doriath"/>
* Celegorm is slain by [[Dior]]. Deaths of [[Curufin]] and [[Caranthir]]. Both Dior and his wife [[Nimloth (elf of Doriath)|Nimloth]] are killed.<ref name="Years"/><ref name="Doriath"/><ref group="note">In the final version of the [[The Tale of Years (The War of the Jewels)|''The Tale of Years'']] from ''[[The War of the Jewels]]'', Dior's wife is named '''[[Nimloth (elf of Doriath)|Lindis]]''', survives during the [[Second Kinslaying]] and escapes to [[Ossiriand]] alongside her daughter [[Elwing]] and with the [[Nauglamír]], but later she turns her way towards the [[Mouths of Sirion|Havens of Sirion]], hearing of the gathering of [[Exiles of Gondolin|exiles]] from [[Gondolin]] in that place.</ref>
* [[Eluréd]] and [[Elurín]] are abandoned to die in the forest by the cruel servants of Celegorm.<ref name="Years"/><ref name="Doriath"/>
